name: komodo
tagline: A self-hosted status page and incident management platform
description: Komodo is a modern web based status page and incident management platform. It allows teams to display service health, schedule maintenance and communicate outages, running fully self hosted for privacy conscious organizations.

features.title: Server and Service Monitoring
features.description: Monitor servers and services from a centralized interface

features.title: Agent-Based Data Collection
features.description: Collect metrics from managed nodes using lightweight agents

features.title: Alerts
features.description: Notify users when monitored services change state

features.title: Dashboard Views
features.description: View system status and metrics in dashboards

features.title: Multi-Node Support
features.description: Monitor multiple machines from a single instance

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the monitoring system on your own infrastructure
